mapper.select: SELECT DOC_NO AS DOC_ID , TO_CHAR(FRT_REGI_DH,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRT_REGI_DH FROM TBDOCUMENTHIS ORDER BY FRT_REGI_DH DESC

SELECT 'TBBADFRE113M' AS TBL_NM , (SELECT COMMENTS FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'TBBADFRE113M' AND OWNER = 'UBCREOWN') AS TBL_DESC , #{cmtYr} AS CMT_YR , #{cmtDvsnCd} AS CMT_DVSN_CD , #{cmtSq} AS CMT_SQ , #{cmtSbjSno} AS CMT_SBJ_SNO , ACP_YR , ACP_DVSN_CD , ACP_SRNO , DOC_ID , APVR_CD , AFF_SNO , DSP_RQ_SNO , SBCN_REGI_REQ_DT , AFF_DSP_CD , DSP_RQ_CD , SBCN_REGI_REQ_YN , SBCN_NBC , SBCN_DY , SBCN_PAGE_CNT , SBCN_NO , SBCN_VT_CD , SBCN_VT_TXT , ACP_MAIN_STEP_SNO , SORT_SNO , SBCN_RPTR , FRT_USR_ID , FNL_USR_ID , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD , FNL_MNU_ID , TO_CHAR(FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRT_REGI_DH , TO_CHAR(FNL_MDF_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FNL_MDF_DH , ENF_JA_CPR_DT , SBCN_PRSS_DPT_NM FROM TBBADFRE113M WHERE (ACP_YR, ACP_DVSN_CD, ACP_SRNO) IN (SELECT ACP_YR, ACP_DVSN_CD , ACP_SRNO FROM TBBADFRE012M WHERE NVL(MG_ACP_YR, ACP_YR) = #{acpYr} AND NVL(MG_ACP_DVSN_CD, ACP_DVSN_CD) = #{acpDvsnCd} AND NVL(MG_ACP_SRNO, ACP_SRNO) = #{acpSrno})

SELECT 'TBBADFRE012M' AS TBL_NM , (SELECT COMMENTS FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'TBBADFRE012M' AND OWNER = 'UBCREOWN') AS TBL_DESC , #{cmtYr} AS CMT_YR , #{cmtDvsnCd} AS CMT_DVSN_CD , #{cmtSq} AS CMT_SQ , #{cmtSbjSno} AS CMT_SBJ_SNO , ACP_YR , ACP_DVSN_CD , ACP_SRNO , ORG_ACP_SRNO , DPT_CD , JDG_REQ_DVSN_SRNO , JDG_REQ_DVSN_CD , ACP_DT , REQ_DT , TIT_NM , RPT_DT , HNDL_DDLN_DT , REL_AM , DFNT_CNT , ORG_CD , ORG_NM , REQR_NM , AGT_NM , PSN_CRP_DVSN_CD , EIN , BZN , ISU_TXT , HNDL_CHGR_NM , AUD_YR , AUD_NO , DSP_RQ_SNO , HNDL_STT_TXT , OW_HNDL_RMK , EXTN_RSN , ZCD , AD , DTL_AD , TNB_1 , TNB_2 , TNB_3 , HP_TNB_1 , HP_TNB_2 , HP_TNB_3 , HNDL_CHGR_TNB_1 , HNDL_CHGR_TNB_2 , HNDL_CHGR_TNB_3 , BAI_DSP_DIV_CD , BAI_DSP_YN , CVPT_SEN_ACP_NO , ACP_NO_SMS_SEN_YN , TO_CHAR(ACP_NO_SMS_SEN_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ACP_NO_SMS_SEN_DH , WRTANS_SEN_YN , STTC_CNT , MG_ACP_YR , MG_ACP_DVSN_CD , MG_ACP_SRNO , MG_DPT_CD , DSP_OFC_ACP_DT , DSP_OFC_UP_INSTT_CD , DSP_OFC_UP_INSTT_NAM , DSP_OFC_UP_INSTT_ACP_DT , CNTR_ADMNSTMACH_CD , CNTR_ADMNSTMACH_NAM , CNTR_ADMNSTMACH_ACP_DT , DSPTCH_INSTT_NAM , RMK , ORG_DSP_KWA_NAM , WRTANS_SEN_DT , MG_DIV_CD , ACP_HNDL_STA_CD , VT_KND_CD , FRT_USR_ID , FNL_USR_ID , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD , FNL_MNU_ID , TO_CHAR(FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRT_REGI_DH , TO_CHAR(FNL_MDF_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FNL_MDF_DH , REFER_ENT , ORG_DSP_KWA_OPIN_SRCH_STEP_CD , ORG_DSP_KWA_OPIN_SRCH_DT , ORG_DSP_KWA_OPIN_RCPT_DT , REQR_OPM_SEN_DT , DEL_YN , DCS_DT , DCS_SBJ , AMIT_AM , ATH_RE_RVW_YN , HNDL_CHGR_CD , INSTT_OPM_SEN_DT , DCS_DVSN_CD , DCS_YR , DCS_NO , DCS_DOC_NOC , AGT_ZCD , AGT_AD , AGT_DTL_AD , AGT_TNB_1 , AGT_TNB_2 , AGT_TNB_3 , AGT_HP_TNB_1 , AGT_HP_TNB_2 , AGT_HP_TNB_3 , HNDL_OPNN_CD FROM TBBADFRE012M WHERE (ACP_YR, ACP_DVSN_CD, ACP_SRNO) IN (SELECT ACP_YR, ACP_DVSN_CD , ACP_SRNO FROM TBBADFRE012M WHERE NVL(MG_ACP_YR, ACP_YR) = #{acpYr} AND NVL(MG_ACP_DVSN_CD, ACP_DVSN_CD) = #{acpDvsnCd} AND NVL(MG_ACP_SRNO, ACP_SRNO) = #{acpSrno})

SELECT 'TBBADFRE013D' AS TBL_NM , (SELECT COMMENTS FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'TBBADFRE013D' AND OWNER = 'UBCREOWN') AS TBL_DESC , #{cmtYr} AS CMT_YR , #{cmtDvsnCd} AS CMT_DVSN_CD , #{cmtSq} AS CMT_SQ , #{cmtSbjSno} AS CMT_SBJ_SNO , ACP_YR , ACP_DVSN_CD , ACP_SRNO , ORG_ACP_SRNO , DPT_CD , ENF_DT , ENFM_DT , ENFM_TXT , LWS_INST_DT , JUDG_DT , JUDG_TXT , DF_DT , RLS_DT , UN_HNDL_RSN , HNDL_PLN_TXT , ODOC_NO , LWS_YO , FRTRL_CT_NM , FRTRL_EVT_NO_TXT , FNL_RSLT_TXT , FRT_USR_ID , FNL_USR_ID , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD , FNL_MNU_ID , TO_CHAR(FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRT_REGI_DH , TO_CHAR(FNL_MDF_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FNL_MDF_DH FROM TBBADFRE013D WHERE (ACP_YR, ACP_DVSN_CD, ACP_SRNO) IN (SELECT ACP_YR, ACP_DVSN_CD , ACP_SRNO FROM TBBADFRE012M WHERE NVL(MG_ACP_YR, ACP_YR) = #{acpYr} AND NVL(MG_ACP_DVSN_CD, ACP_DVSN_CD) = #{acpDvsnCd} AND NVL(MG_ACP_SRNO, ACP_SRNO) = #{acpSrno})

SELECT 'TBBADFRE112M' AS TBL_NM , (SELECT COMMENTS FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'TBBADFRE112M' AND OWNER = 'UBCREOWN') AS TBL_DESC , #{cmtYr} AS CMT_YR , #{cmtDvsnCd} AS CMT_DVSN_CD , #{cmtSq} AS CMT_SQ , #{cmtSbjSno} AS CMT_SBJ_SNO , ACP_YR , ACP_DVSN_CD , ACP_SRNO , TIT_NM , SBCN_TRTM_REQ_DT , REGI_NO , CHF_CMTR_ID , SHARE_YN , SORT_SNO , SHARE_CMTR_ID , SHARE_DT , RMK_SBJ , FRT_USR_ID , FNL_USR_ID , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD , FNL_MNU_ID , TO_CHAR(FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRT_REGI_DH , TO_CHAR(FNL_MDF_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FNL_MDF_DH , SBMT_DVSN_NO , USE_YN FROM TBBADFRE112M WHERE (ACP_YR, ACP_DVSN_CD, ACP_SRNO) IN (SELECT ACP_YR, ACP_DVSN_CD , ACP_SRNO FROM TBBADFRE012M WHERE NVL(MG_ACP_YR, ACP_YR) = #{acpYr} AND NVL(MG_ACP_DVSN_CD, ACP_DVSN_CD) = #{acpDvsnCd} AND NVL(MG_ACP_SRNO, ACP_SRNO) = #{acpSrno})

SELECT 'TBBADFRE112D' AS TBL_NM , (SELECT COMMENTS FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'TBBADFRE112D' AND OWNER = 'UBCREOWN') AS TBL_DESC , #{cmtYr} AS CMT_YR , #{cmtDvsnCd} AS CMT_DVSN_CD , #{cmtSq} AS CMT_SQ , #{cmtSbjSno} AS CMT_SBJ_SNO , ACP_YR , ACP_DVSN_CD , ACP_SRNO , SBCN_TRTM_DTL_SNO , DOC_ID , RVW_REQ_DT , RVW_CMPT_YN , RVW_CMPT_DT , SORT_SNO , FRT_USR_ID , FNL_USR_ID , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD , FNL_MNU_ID , TO_CHAR(FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRT_REGI_DH , TO_CHAR(FNL_MDF_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FNL_MDF_DH , REGI_NO , RMK_SBJ , SHARE_CMTR_ID , SHARE_DT , SHARE_YN FROM TBBADFRE112D WHERE (ACP_YR, ACP_DVSN_CD, ACP_SRNO) IN (SELECT ACP_YR, ACP_DVSN_CD , ACP_SRNO FROM TBBADFRE012M WHERE NVL(MG_ACP_YR, ACP_YR) = #{acpYr} AND NVL(MG_ACP_DVSN_CD, ACP_DVSN_CD) = #{acpDvsnCd} AND NVL(MG_ACP_SRNO, ACP_SRNO) = #{acpSrno})

SELECT 'TBBADDED116L' AS TBL_NM , (SELECT COMMENTS FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'TBBADDED116L' AND OWNER = 'UBCREOWN') AS TBL_DESC , #{cmtYr} AS CMT_YR , #{cmtDvsnCd} AS CMT_DVSN_CD , #{cmtSq} AS CMT_SQ , #{cmtSbjSno} AS CMT_SBJ_SNO , AUD_YR , AUD_NO , TASK_DVSN_CD , SRNO , CHF_CMTR_CNB , CHF_CMTR1_CNB , CHF_CMTR2_CNB , CHF_CMTR3_CNB , CHF_CMTR4_CNB , CHF_CMTR5_CNB , ALC_RMK , ALC_USR_CNB , TO_CHAR(ALC_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ALC_DH , FRT_USR_ID , FNL_USR_ID , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD , FNL_MNU_ID , TO_CHAR(FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRT_REGI_DH , TO_CHAR(FNL_MDF_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FNL_MDF_DH , DOC_ID , MAIN_AUD_RPRT_YN FROM TBBADDED116L WHERE AUD_YR = #{acpYr} AND TASK_DVSN_CD = #{acpDvsnCd} AND AUD_NO = #{acpSrno}

SELECT 'TBBADFRE103M' AS TBL_NM , (SELECT COMMENTS FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'TBBADFRE103M' AND OWNER = 'UBCREOWN') AS TBL_DESC , #{cmtYr} AS CMT_YR , #{cmtDvsnCd} AS CMT_DVSN_CD , #{cmtSq} AS CMT_SQ , #{cmtSbjSno} AS CMT_SBJ_SNO , ACP_YR , ACP_DVSN_CD , ACP_SRNO , ACP_STEP_CD , DOC_ID , ACP_KND_CD , ACP_GRN_NO , RPRT_NM , LINK_URL , NECES_YN , APV_STA_CD , RPRT_CD , APV_RQS_ID , SND_DOC_YN , DOC_KND_CD , ACP_RPRT_DVSN_CD , REF_ID , REF_DY , RLTN_ORG_CD , SORT_SNO , ACP_DOC_KND_CD , CON_PGM_CD , APV_WAY_CD , DOC_WRT_ID , ONR_HNDL_NO , DLV_DT , DLV_CNT , AUD_DOC_ID , AUD_RPRT_CD , EDT_AUTH , FRT_USR_ID , FNL_USR_ID , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD , FNL_MNU_ID , TO_CHAR(FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRT_REGI_DH , TO_CHAR(FNL_MDF_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FNL_MDF_DH , DLV_RMK , CPS_JUD_REL_BLT , CPS_JUD_REL_RANK , CPS_JUD_REL_NAME , TO_CHAR(OPEN_DOC_NTCE_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS OPEN_DOC_NTCE_DH , RCPT_NM , RCPT_AD , CHGR_ID , TEMPLATE_DOC_ID , SHARE_YN , ORG_DSP_KWA_OPIN_SRCH_DT , ORG_DSP_KWA_OPIN_RCPT_DT FROM TBBADFRE103M WHERE (ACP_YR, ACP_DVSN_CD, ACP_SRNO) IN (SELECT ACP_YR, ACP_DVSN_CD , ACP_SRNO FROM TBBADFRE012M WHERE NVL(MG_ACP_YR, ACP_YR) = #{acpYr} AND NVL(MG_ACP_DVSN_CD, ACP_DVSN_CD) = #{acpDvsnCd} AND NVL(MG_ACP_SRNO, ACP_SRNO) = #{acpSrno}) AND (/*부의안 요약문, 결정문*/ RPRT_CD IN ('D10300100', 'E10500100','D10301100', 'E10500600', 'D10301110', 'E10500610', 'D10301120', 'E10500620') OR /*원처분문서*/ ((ACP_YR, ACP_DVSN_CD, ACP_SRNO) IN (SELECT ACP_YR, ACP_DVSN_CD, ACP_SRNO FROM TBBADFRE111M WHERE (ACP_YR, ACP_DVSN_CD, ACP_SRNO) IN (SELECT ACP_YR, ACP_DVSN_CD , ACP_SRNO FROM TBBADFRE012M WHERE NVL(MG_ACP_YR, ACP_YR) = #{acpYr} AND NVL(MG_ACP_DVSN_CD, ACP_DVSN_CD) = #{acpDvsnCd} AND NVL(MG_ACP_SRNO, ACP_SRNO) = #{acpSrno}) AND ACP_STEP_CD IN ('D1010','E1010')) AND ACP_STEP_CD IN ('D1010','E1010') AND REF_ID IS NOT NULL) )

SELECT 'TBBADFRE111M' AS TBL_NM , (SELECT COMMENTS FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'TBBADFRE111M' AND OWNER = 'UBCREOWN') AS TBL_DESC , #{cmtYr} AS CMT_YR , #{cmtDvsnCd} AS CMT_DVSN_CD , #{cmtSq} AS CMT_SQ , #{cmtSbjSno} AS CMT_SBJ_SNO , ACP_YR , ACP_DVSN_CD , ACP_SRNO , ACP_STEP_CD , DOC_ID , SR_DOC_SNO , ACP_KND_CD , ACP_GRN_NO , RPRT_NM , RPRT_CD , LINK_URL , DOC_STA_CD , SND_DPT_CD , SNDR_ID , TO_CHAR(SND_DH , 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SND_DH , RCPT_DPT_CD , RCNT_ID , TO_CHAR(RCPT_DH , 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS RCPT_DH , ACP_RPRT_DVSN_CD , DOC_KND_CD , REF_ID , REF_DY , SORT_SNO , FRT_USR_ID , FNL_USR_ID , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD , FNL_MNU_ID , TO_CHAR(FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRT_REGI_DH , TO_CHAR(FNL_MDF_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FNL_MDF_DH FROM TBBADFRE111M WHERE (ACP_YR, ACP_DVSN_CD, ACP_SRNO) IN (SELECT ACP_YR, ACP_DVSN_CD , ACP_SRNO FROM TBBADFRE012M WHERE NVL(MG_ACP_YR, ACP_YR) = #{acpYr} AND NVL(MG_ACP_DVSN_CD, ACP_DVSN_CD) = #{acpDvsnCd} AND NVL(MG_ACP_SRNO, ACP_SRNO) = #{acpSrno}) AND (RPRT_CD IN ('D10301100', 'E10500600', 'D10301110', 'E10500610', 'D10301120', 'E10500620') OR ((ACP_YR, ACP_DVSN_CD, ACP_SRNO) IN (SELECT ACP_YR, ACP_DVSN_CD, ACP_SRNO FROM TBBADFRE111M WHERE (ACP_YR, ACP_DVSN_CD, ACP_SRNO) IN (SELECT ACP_YR, ACP_DVSN_CD , ACP_SRNO FROM TBBADFRE012M WHERE NVL(MG_ACP_YR, ACP_YR) = #{acpYr} AND NVL(MG_ACP_DVSN_CD, ACP_DVSN_CD) = #{acpDvsnCd} AND NVL(MG_ACP_SRNO, ACP_SRNO) = #{acpSrno}) AND ACP_STEP_CD IN ('D1010','E1010')) AND ACP_STEP_CD IN ('D1010','E1010') AND REF_ID IS NOT NULL) )

SELECT 'TBBADFRE110M' AS TBL_NM , (SELECT COMMENTS FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'TBBADFRE110M' AND OWNER = 'UBCREOWN') AS TBL_DESC , #{cmtYr} AS CMT_YR , #{cmtDvsnCd} AS CMT_DVSN_CD , #{cmtSq} AS CMT_SQ , #{cmtSbjSno} AS CMT_SBJ_SNO , ACP_YR , ACP_DVSN_CD , ACP_SRNO , EVI_DCM_MPP_SNO , ACP_KND_CD , ACP_GRN_NO , DOC_ID , ACP_DCM_DOC_ID , RPRT_FILD_ID , EVI_DCMB_SNO , EVI_MPP_DVSN_CD , SORT_SNO , HYPER_LINK_YN , FRT_USR_ID , FNL_USR_ID , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD , FNL_MNU_ID , TO_CHAR(FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRT_REGI_DH , TO_CHAR(FNL_MDF_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FNL_MDF_DH FROM TBBADFRE110M WHERE (ACP_YR, ACP_DVSN_CD, ACP_SRNO) IN (SELECT ACP_YR, ACP_DVSN_CD , ACP_SRNO FROM TBBADFRE012M WHERE NVL(MG_ACP_YR, ACP_YR) = #{acpYr} AND NVL(MG_ACP_DVSN_CD, ACP_DVSN_CD) = #{acpDvsnCd} AND NVL(MG_ACP_SRNO, ACP_SRNO) = #{acpSrno})

SELECT 'TBBADFRE108M' AS TBL_NM , (SELECT COMMENTS FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'TBBADFRE108M' AND OWNER = 'UBCREOWN') AS TBL_DESC , #{cmtYr} AS CMT_YR , #{cmtDvsnCd} AS CMT_DVSN_CD , #{cmtSq} AS CMT_SQ , #{cmtSbjSno} AS CMT_SBJ_SNO , ACP_YR , ACP_DVSN_CD , ACP_SRNO , EVI_DCMB_SNO , ACP_KND_CD , ACP_GRN_NO , FOLDER_NM , DCMB_CRE_ID , SORT_SNO , FRT_USR_ID , FNL_USR_ID , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD , FNL_MNU_ID , TO_CHAR(FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRT_REGI_DH , TO_CHAR(FNL_MDF_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FNL_MDF_DH FROM TBBADFRE108M WHERE (ACP_YR, ACP_DVSN_CD, ACP_SRNO) IN (SELECT ACP_YR, ACP_DVSN_CD , ACP_SRNO FROM TBBADFRE012M WHERE NVL(MG_ACP_YR, ACP_YR) = #{acpYr} AND NVL(MG_ACP_DVSN_CD, ACP_DVSN_CD) = #{acpDvsnCd} AND NVL(MG_ACP_SRNO, ACP_SRNO) = #{acpSrno})

SELECT 'TBBADFRE108D' AS TBL_NM , (SELECT COMMENTS FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'TBBADFRE108D' AND OWNER = 'UBCREOWN') AS TBL_DESC , #{cmtYr} AS CMT_YR , #{cmtDvsnCd} AS CMT_DVSN_CD , #{cmtSq} AS CMT_SQ , #{cmtSbjSno} AS CMT_SBJ_SNO , ACP_YR , ACP_DVSN_CD , ACP_SRNO , EVI_DCMB_SNO , ACP_DCM_DOC_ID , ACP_KND_CD , ACP_GRN_NO , EVI_DCM_DVSN_CD , FILE_NM , ISUE_DY , ACP_DCM_CRE_ID , SORT_SNO , FILE_SIZE , FRT_USR_ID , FNL_USR_ID , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD , FNL_MNU_ID , TO_CHAR(FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRT_REGI_DH , TO_CHAR(FNL_MDF_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FNL_MDF_DH FROM TBBADFRE108D WHERE (ACP_YR, ACP_DVSN_CD, ACP_SRNO) IN (SELECT ACP_YR, ACP_DVSN_CD , ACP_SRNO FROM TBBADFRE012M WHERE NVL(MG_ACP_YR, ACP_YR) = #{acpYr} AND NVL(MG_ACP_DVSN_CD, ACP_DVSN_CD) = #{acpDvsnCd} AND NVL(MG_ACP_SRNO, ACP_SRNO) = #{acpSrno})

SELECT 'TBBADFRE115M' AS TBL_NM , (SELECT COMMENTS FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'TBBADFRE115M' AND OWNER = 'UBCREOWN') AS TBL_DESC , #{cmtYr} AS CMT_YR , #{cmtDvsnCd} AS CMT_DVSN_CD , #{cmtSq} AS CMT_SQ , #{cmtSbjSno} AS CMT_SBJ_SNO , ACP_DVSN_CD , ACP_YR , ACP_SRNO , SRNO , RPRT_FILD_ID , DOC_ID , FRT_USR_ID , FNL_USR_ID , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD , FNL_MNU_ID , TO_CHAR(FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRT_REGI_DH , TO_CHAR(FNL_MDF_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FNL_MDF_DH FROM TBBADFRE115M WHERE (ACP_YR, ACP_DVSN_CD, ACP_SRNO) IN (SELECT ACP_YR, ACP_DVSN_CD , ACP_SRNO FROM TBBADFRE012M WHERE NVL(MG_ACP_YR, ACP_YR) = #{acpYr} AND NVL(MG_ACP_DVSN_CD, ACP_DVSN_CD) = #{acpDvsnCd} AND NVL(MG_ACP_SRNO, ACP_SRNO) = #{acpSrno})
SELECT AUD_YR , AUD_NO FROM TBBADDED113M WHERE SBCN_DY = #{cmtDy} GROUP BY AUD_YR, AUD_NO

SELECT 'TBBADDED113M' AS TBL_NM , (SELECT COMMENTS FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'TBBADDED113M' AND OWNER = 'UBCREOWN') AS TBL_DESC , #{cmtYr} AS CMT_YR , #{cmtDvsnCd} AS CMT_DVSN_CD , #{cmtSq} AS CMT_SQ , #{cmtSbjSno} AS CMT_SBJ_SNO , AUD_YR , AUD_NO , DOC_ID , APVR_CD , AFF_SNO , DSP_RQ_SNO , SBCN_REGI_REQ_DT , AUD_KND_CD , AUD_GRN_NO , AFF_DSP_CD , DSP_RQ_CD , SBCN_REGI_REQ_YN , SBCN_NBC , SBCN_DY , SBCN_PAGE_CNT , SBCN_NO , SBCN_VT_CD , SBCN_VT_TXT , AUD_MAIN_STEP_SNO , SORT_SNO , SBCN_RPTR , SBCN_PRSS_DPT_NM , REL_TSK_NM , FRT_USR_ID , FNL_USR_ID , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD , FNL_MNU_ID , TO_CHAR(FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRT_REGI_DH , TO_CHAR(FNL_MDF_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FNL_MDF_DH , RE_SBCN_DY , RE_SBCN_CMT_SQ , RE_SBCN_TITLE_NM , RE_SBCN_TXT , ENF_JA_CPR_DT FROM TBBADDED113M WHERE SBCN_DY = #{cmtDy} AND AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND AUD_NO = #{audNo}

SELECT 'TBBADDED112M' AS TBL_NM , (SELECT COMMENTS FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'TBBADDED112M' AND OWNER = 'UBCREOWN') AS TBL_DESC , #{cmtYr} AS CMT_YR , #{cmtDvsnCd} AS CMT_DVSN_CD , #{cmtSq} AS CMT_SQ , #{cmtSbjSno} AS CMT_SBJ_SNO , AUD_YR , AUD_NO , AUD_KND_CD , AUD_GRN_NO , AUD_SBJ_NM , SBCN_TRTM_REQ_DT , REGI_NO , CHF_CMTR_ID , SHARE_YN , SORT_SNO , FRT_USR_ID , FNL_USR_ID , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD , FNL_MNU_ID , TO_CHAR(FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRT_REGI_DH , TO_CHAR(FNL_MDF_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FNL_MDF_DH , SHARE_CMTR_ID , SHARE_DT , RMK_SBJ , SBMT_DVSN_NO , USE_YN , CHF_CMTR_ID_1 , CHF_CMTR_ID_2 FROM TBBADDED112M WHERE AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND AUD_NO = #{audNo}

SELECT 'TBBADDED112D' AS TBL_NM , (SELECT COMMENTS FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'TBBADDED112D' AND OWNER = 'UBCREOWN') AS TBL_DESC , #{cmtYr} AS CMT_YR , #{cmtDvsnCd} AS CMT_DVSN_CD , #{cmtSq} AS CMT_SQ , #{cmtSbjSno} AS CMT_SBJ_SNO , AUD_YR , AUD_NO , SBCN_TRTM_DTL_SNO , DOC_ID , RVW_REQ_DT , RVW_CMPT_YN , RVW_CMPT_DT , SORT_SNO , FRT_USR_ID , FNL_USR_ID , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD , FNL_MNU_ID , TO_CHAR(FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRT_REGI_DH , TO_CHAR(FNL_MDF_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FNL_MDF_DH , REGI_NO , RMK_SBJ , SHARE_CMTR_ID , SHARE_DT , SHARE_YN FROM TBBADDED112D WHERE AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND AUD_NO = #{audNo}

SELECT 'TBBADDED001M' AS TBL_NM , (SELECT COMMENTS FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'TBBADDED001M' AND OWNER = 'UBCREOWN') AS TBL_DESC , #{cmtYr} AS CMT_YR , #{cmtDvsnCd} AS CMT_DVSN_CD , #{cmtSq} AS CMT_SQ , #{cmtSbjSno} AS CMT_SBJ_SNO , AUD_YR , AUD_NO , AUD_TASK_CD , ORG_DVSN_CD , AUD_KND_CD , SPV_BRDV_CD , AUD_WAY_CD , AUD_SBJ_NM , AUD_SCL_CD , TSK_CAT_CD , EPS_TASK_CD , AUD_TOT_DRTR_CNB , TOT_DRTR_RANK_CD , TOT_DRTR_BRDV_CD , AUD_RPST_ORG_CD , SPVR_CNB , SPVR_BRDV_CD , SPVR_RANK_CD , AST_CNB , AST_BRDV_CD , AST_RANK_CD , PRSS_STEP_CD , MNG_DPT_CD , ACP_YR , CVPT_ACP_NO , REQ_DVSN_CD , FRT_USR_ID , FNL_USR_ID , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD , FNL_MNU_ID , TO_CHAR(FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRT_REGI_DH , TO_CHAR(FNL_MDF_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FNL_MDF_DH , DVS_AUD_YR , DVS_AUD_NO , ITGT_AUD_YR , ITGT_AUD_NO , AUD_GRN_NO , AUD_CTRL_CD , BZT_BGT_DVSN_CD , PRL_SMT_DT , APV_DOC_NO , AUD_STEP_CD , CHF_CMTR_CNB , TO_CHAR(ITGT_DVS_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ITGT_DVS_DH , ITGT_DVS_ID , ITGT_DVS_RS , SEC_AUD_YN FROM TBBADDED001M WHERE AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND AUD_NO = #{audNo}

SELECT 'TBBADDED145M' AS TBL_NM , (SELECT COMMENTS FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'TBBADDED145M' AND OWNER = 'UBCREOWN') AS TBL_DESC , #{cmtYr} AS CMT_YR , #{cmtDvsnCd} AS CMT_DVSN_CD , #{cmtSq} AS CMT_SQ , #{cmtSbjSno} AS CMT_SBJ_SNO , AUD_YR , AUD_NO , AUD_STEP_CD , DOC_ID , APVR_CD , AFF_SNO , AUD_KND_CD , AUD_GRN_NO , RPRT_FILD_ID , AFF_CD , LIST_NO , REFER_DVSN_CD , AFF_SPH , TITLE_NM , QST_DOC_ISUE_YN , QST_DOC_ISUE_DY , AUDTOR , DETL_DOC_NO , MTRL_IPT_DVSN_CD , SYT_TRTM_DVSN_YN , SCRT_YN , SORT_SNO , TRTM_EXAMER_CNB , FNL_YN , FRT_USR_ID , FNL_USR_ID , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD , FNL_MNU_ID , TO_CHAR(FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRT_REGI_DH , TO_CHAR(FNL_MDF_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FNL_MDF_DH , REF_DOC_ID FROM TBBADDED145M WHERE (AUD_YR, AUD_NO, DOC_ID, AFF_SNO, APVR_CD) IN (SELECT AUD_YR, AUD_NO, DOC_ID, AFF_SNO, APVR_CD FROM TBBADDED113M WHERE AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND AUD_NO = #{audNo} AND SBCN_DY = #{cmtDy})

SELECT 'TBBADDED146M' AS TBL_NM , (SELECT COMMENTS FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'TBBADDED146M' AND OWNER = 'UBCREOWN') AS TBL_DESC , #{cmtYr} AS CMT_YR , #{cmtDvsnCd} AS CMT_DVSN_CD , #{cmtSq} AS CMT_SQ , #{cmtSbjSno} AS CMT_SBJ_SNO , AUD_YR , AUD_NO , AUD_STEP_CD , DOC_ID , APVR_CD , AFF_SNO , DSP_RQ_SNO , AUD_KND_CD , AUD_GRN_NO , RPRT_FILD_ID , AFF_DSP_CD , RLTN_ORG_CD , HND_ORG_CD , REF_ORG_CD , DSP_RQ_CD , MTRL_IPT_DVSN_CD , NOP_AM_DVSN_CD , NOP_AM , SORT_SNO , ACCN_INSP_CD , FNL_YN , FRT_USR_ID , FNL_USR_ID , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD , FNL_MNU_ID , TO_CHAR(FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRT_REGI_DH , TO_CHAR(FNL_MDF_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FNL_MDF_DH , NOP_SUM , HD_AUD_STEP_CD , HD_DOC_ID , HD_APVR_CD , HD_AFF_SNO , HD_DSP_RQ_SNO , REF_DOC_ID , DF_AUD_STEP_CD , DF_DOC_ID , DF_APVR_CD , DF_AFF_SNO , DF_DSP_RQ_SNO FROM TBBADDED146M WHERE (AUD_YR, AUD_NO, DOC_ID, AFF_SNO, APVR_CD) IN (SELECT AUD_YR, AUD_NO, DOC_ID, AFF_SNO, APVR_CD FROM TBBADDED113M WHERE AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND AUD_NO = #{audNo} AND SBCN_DY = #{cmtDy})

SELECT 'TBBADDED103M' AS TBL_NM , (SELECT COMMENTS FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'TBBADDED103M' AND OWNER = 'UBCREOWN') AS TBL_DESC , #{cmtYr} AS CMT_YR , #{cmtDvsnCd} AS CMT_DVSN_CD , #{cmtSq} AS CMT_SQ , #{cmtSbjSno} AS CMT_SBJ_SNO , AUD_YR , AUD_NO , AUD_STEP_CD , DOC_ID , AUD_KND_CD , AUD_GRN_NO , RPRT_NM , LINK_URL , NECES_YN , APV_STA_CD , RPRT_CD , APV_RQS_ID , SND_DOC_YN , DOC_KND_CD , AUD_RPRT_DVSN_CD , REF_ID , REF_DY , RLTN_ORG_CD , SORT_SNO , SYT_TRTM_DVSN_YN , AUD_DOC_KND_CD , CON_PGM_CD , APV_WAY_CD , DOC_WRT_ID , ONR_HNDL_NO , FRT_USR_ID , FNL_USR_ID , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD , FNL_MNU_ID , TO_CHAR(FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRT_REGI_DH , TO_CHAR(FNL_MDF_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FNL_MDF_DH , EDT_AUTH , SECU_RPT_YN , FNL_RPRT_CRE_YN , FNL_BAI_RPRT_YN , REF_DOC_ID , TEMPLATE_DOC_ID , USE_YN FROM TBBADDED103M WHERE AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND AUD_NO = #{audNo} AND ((RPRT_CD IN ('A10700500', 'A10700600', 'A10700800' ,'A10700700') AND REF_DY = (SELECT SBCN_REGI_REQ_DT FROM TBBADDED113M WHERE SBCN_DY = #{cmtDy} )) OR (RPRT_CD = 'A10600900' AND REF_ID IN (SELECT C.RPRT_LINK_SEQ FROM TBBADDED113M A INNER JOIN TBBADDED146M B ON A.AUD_YR = B.AUD_YR AND A.AUD_NO = B.AUD_NO AND A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID AND A.AFF_SNO = B.AFF_SNO AND A.DSP_RQ_SNO = B.DSP_RQ_SNO AND A.APVR_CD = B.APVR_CD INNER JOIN TBCSPKDE106M C ON C.AUD_YR = A.AUD_YR AND C.AUD_NO = A.AUD_NO AND C.AFF_SNO = A.AFF_SNO AND C.RPRT_FILD_ID = B.RPRT_FILD_ID WHERE A.SBCN_DY = #{cmtDy} GROUP BY A.AUD_YR, A.AUD_NO, C.RPRT_LINK_SEQ ,A.SBCN_DY)) OR (RPRT_CD = 'A10601000' AND REF_ID = (SELECT AFF_SNO FROM TBBADDED113M WHERE AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND AUD_NO = #{audNo} AND SBCN_DY = #{cmtDy}
)))

SELECT 'TBBADDED110M' AS TBL_NM , (SELECT COMMENTS FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'TBBADDED110M' AND OWNER = 'UBCREOWN') AS TBL_DESC , #{cmtYr} AS CMT_YR , #{cmtDvsnCd} AS CMT_DVSN_CD , #{cmtSq} AS CMT_SQ , #{cmtSbjSno} AS CMT_SBJ_SNO , C.AUD_YR , C.AUD_NO , C.EVI_DCM_MPP_SNO , C.AUD_KND_CD , C.AUD_GRN_NO , C.DOC_ID , C.AUD_DCM_DOC_ID , C.RPRT_FILD_ID , C.EVI_DCMB_SNO , C.EVI_MPP_DVSN_CD , C.SORT_SNO , C.HYPER_LINK_YN , C.FRT_USR_ID , C.FNL_USR_ID , C.FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD , C.FNL_MNU_ID , TO_CHAR(C.FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRT_REGI_DH , TO_CHAR(C.FNL_MDF_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FNL_MDF_DH , EVI_OPEN_STAT_YN , EVI_OPEN_STAT_DT , AFF_SNO FROM (SELECT A.AUD_YR, A.AUD_NO, B.RPRT_FILD_ID FROM TBBADDED113M A INNER JOIN TBBADDED146M B ON A.AUD_YR = B.AUD_YR AND A.AUD_NO = B.AUD_NO AND A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID AND A.AFF_SNO = B.AFF_SNO AND A.DSP_RQ_SNO = B.DSP_RQ_SNO AND A.APVR_CD = B.APVR_CD WHERE A.SBCN_DY = #{cmtDy} GROUP BY A.AUD_YR, A.AUD_NO, B.RPRT_FILD_ID ) A INNER JOIN TBBADDED110M C ON C.AUD_YR = A.AUD_YR AND C.AUD_NO = A.AUD_NO AND C.RPRT_FILD_ID = A.RPRT_FILD_ID WHERE A.AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND A.AUD_NO = #{audNo}

SELECT 'TBBADDED115M' AS TBL_NM , (SELECT COMMENTS FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'TBBADDED115M' AND OWNER = 'UBCREOWN') AS TBL_DESC , #{cmtYr} AS CMT_YR , #{cmtDvsnCd} AS CMT_DVSN_CD , #{cmtSq} AS CMT_SQ , #{cmtSbjSno} AS CMT_SBJ_SNO , C.AUD_YR , C.AUD_NO , C.SRNO , C.RPRT_FILD_ID , C.DOC_ID , C.FRT_USR_ID , C.FNL_USR_ID , C.FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD , C.FNL_MNU_ID , TO_CHAR(C.FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRT_REGI_DH , TO_CHAR(C.FNL_MDF_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FNL_MDF_DH FROM (SELECT A.AUD_YR, A.AUD_NO, B.RPRT_FILD_ID FROM TBBADDED113M A INNER JOIN TBBADDED146M B ON A.AUD_YR = B.AUD_YR AND A.AUD_NO = B.AUD_NO AND A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID AND A.AFF_SNO = B.AFF_SNO AND A.DSP_RQ_SNO = B.DSP_RQ_SNO AND A.APVR_CD = B.APVR_CD WHERE A.SBCN_DY = #{cmtDy} GROUP BY A.AUD_YR, A.AUD_NO, B.RPRT_FILD_ID ) A INNER JOIN TBBADDED115M C ON C.AUD_YR = A.AUD_YR AND C.AUD_NO = A.AUD_NO AND C.RPRT_FILD_ID = A.RPRT_FILD_ID WHERE A.AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND A.AUD_NO = #{audNo}

SELECT 'TBCSPKDE104M' AS TBL_NM , (SELECT COMMENTS FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'TBCSPKDE104M' AND OWNER = 'UBCREOWN') AS TBL_DESC , #{cmtYr} AS CMT_YR , #{cmtDvsnCd} AS CMT_DVSN_CD , #{cmtSq} AS CMT_SQ , #{cmtSbjSno} AS CMT_SBJ_SNO , D.AUD_YR , D.AUD_NO , D.SRNO , D.DOC_ID , D.AUD_KND_CD , D.AUD_GRN_NO , D.DOC_KND_CD , D.FILE_NM , D.FRT_USR_ID , D.FNL_USR_ID , D.FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD , D.FNL_MNU_ID , TO_CHAR(D.FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRT_REGI_DH , TO_CHAR(D.FNL_MDF_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FNL_MDF_DH , D.RECEV_DY , D.GRN_SRNO FROM (SELECT A.AUD_YR ,A.AUD_NO ,A.SBCN_DY ,C.SRNO FROM TBBADDED113M A INNER JOIN TBBADDED146M B ON A.AUD_YR = B.AUD_YR AND A.AUD_NO = B.AUD_NO AND A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID AND A.AFF_SNO = B.AFF_SNO AND A.DSP_RQ_SNO = B.DSP_RQ_SNO AND A.APVR_CD =B.APVR_CD INNER JOIN TBCSPKDE106M C ON C.AUD_YR = A.AUD_YR AND C.AUD_NO = A.AUD_NO AND C.AFF_SNO = A.AFF_SNO AND C.RPRT_FILD_ID = B.RPRT_FILD_ID GROUP BY A.AUD_YR, A.AUD_NO,A.SBCN_DY , C.SRNO ) A INNER JOIN TBCSPKDE104M D ON A.AUD_YR = D.AUD_YR AND A.AUD_NO = D.AUD_NO AND A.SRNO = D.SRNO WHERE 1=1 AND A.AUD_YR = #{audYr} /*PARAMETER 필수 PK 사용*/ AND A.AUD_NO = #{audNo} /*PARAMETER 감사번호 - 안건단위로 조회 시 필요*/ AND A.SBCN_DY = #{cmtDy} /*PARAMETER 위원회의 일자 */

SELECT 'TBCSPKDE106M' AS TBL_NM , (SELECT COMMENTS FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'TBCSPKDE106M' AND OWNER = 'UBCREOWN') AS TBL_DESC , #{cmtYr} AS CMT_YR , #{cmtDvsnCd} AS CMT_DVSN_CD , #{cmtSq} AS CMT_SQ , #{cmtSbjSno} AS CMT_SBJ_SNO , AUD_YR , AUD_NO , SRNO , AFF_SNO , RPRT_FILD_ID , AFF_SND_STAT_CD , TO_CHAR(AFF_SND_STAT_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS AFF_SND_STAT_DT , RPRT_REQ_CD , TO_CHAR(RPRT_REQ_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS RPRT_REQ_DT , FRT_USR_ID , FNL_USR_ID , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD , FNL_MNU_ID , TO_CHAR(FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRT_REGI_DH , TO_CHAR(FNL_MDF_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FNL_MDF_DH , TRTM_RQS_CD , TO_CHAR(TRTM_RQS_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS TRTM_RQS_DT , RPRT_LINK_SEQ , CLSNG_YN , TO_CHAR(CLSNG_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CLSNG_DT , RECEV_DY , GRN_SRNO FROM TBCSPKDE106M WHERE AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND AUD_NO = #{audNo} AND (RPRT_FILD_ID, AFF_SNO) IN (SELECT A.RPRT_FILD_ID, A.AFF_SNO FROM TBBADDED146M A INNER JOIN TBBADDED113M B ON A.AUD_YR = B.AUD_YR AND A.AUD_NO = B.AUD_NO AND A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID AND A.AFF_SNO = B.AFF_SNO AND A.DSP_RQ_SNO = B.DSP_RQ_SNO AND A.APVR_CD =B.APVR_CD WHERE B.AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND B.AUD_NO = #{audNo} AND B.SBCN_DY = #{cmtDy})

SELECT 'TBCSPKDE103M' AS TBL_NM , (SELECT COMMENTS FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'TBCSPKDE103M' AND OWNER = 'UBCREOWN') AS TBL_DESC , #{cmtYr} AS CMT_YR , #{cmtDvsnCd} AS CMT_DVSN_CD , #{cmtSq} AS CMT_SQ , #{cmtSbjSno} AS CMT_SBJ_SNO , AUD_YR , AUD_NO , SRNO , AFF_SNO , AUD_KND_CD , AUD_GRN_NO , SMT_DT , PRSR , SMT_NOC , CLSNG_YN , TO_CHAR(CLSNG_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CLSNG_DT , AUD_STEP_CD , SPV_DPT_OM_YN , TO_CHAR(SPV_DPT_OM_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SPV_DPT_OM_DT , SPV_DPT_RCV_YN , TO_CHAR(SPV_DPT_RCV_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SPV_DPT_RCV_DT , PRCT_SPV_DPT_OM_YN , TO_CHAR(PRCT_SPV_DPT_OM_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS PRCT_SPV_DPT_OM_DT , RLTN_ORG_CD , MFEX_HNDL_STEP_CD , MFEX_SMT_AIM_YN1 , MFEX_SMT_AIM_YN2 , MFEX_SMT_AIM_YN3 , MFEX_SMT_AIM_YN4 , MFEX_SMT_AIM_YN5 , AGT_YN_CD , AGRS_ADMN_EXET_APL_YN , FTFT_APL_YN , FTFT_EXEC_YN_CD , BAI_REQ_TAG_CD , CHF_REQ_TAG_CD , CHF_ACC_DT , INTV_ARR_DT , INTV_IMPL_DT , INTV_YN_NOTI_CN , MERG_YN , ARCH_SRNO , ENF_DT , RCGT_YN , INDC_SBJ , RMK_SBJ , REV_RPT_RCV_YN , TO_CHAR(REV_RPT_RCV_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REV_RPT_RCV_DT , REV_OPT_RCV_YN , TO_CHAR(REV_OPT_RCV_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REV_OPT_RCV_DT , AFF_SND_STAT_CD , TO_CHAR(AFF_SND_STAT_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS AFF_SND_STAT_DT , FRT_USR_ID , FNL_USR_ID , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD , FNL_MNU_ID , TO_CHAR(FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRT_REGI_DH , TO_CHAR(FNL_MDF_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FNL_MDF_DH , PRCT_SPV_DPT_RCV_YN , TO_CHAR(PRCT_SPV_DPT_RCV_DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS PRCT_SPV_DPT_RCV_DT , PRCT_SPV_RCV_SRNO , RECEV_DY , GRN_SRNO , SMT_ORG_NM , SMT_DETL_CD , AUD_TGT , APVR_CD , OTH_DETL FROM TBCSPKDE103M WHERE (AUD_YR, AUD_NO, AFF_SNO) IN (SELECT AUD_YR, AUD_NO, AFF_SNO FROM TBBADDED113M WHERE AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND AUD_NO = #{audNo} AND SBCN_DY = #{cmtDy} )

SELECT 'TBBADDED108M' AS TBL_NM , (SELECT COMMENTS FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'TBBADDED108M' AND OWNER = 'UBCREOWN') AS TBL_DESC , #{cmtYr} AS CMT_YR , #{cmtDvsnCd} AS CMT_DVSN_CD , #{cmtSq} AS CMT_SQ , #{cmtSbjSno} AS CMT_SBJ_SNO , AUD_YR , AUD_NO , EVI_DCMB_SNO , AUD_KND_CD , AUD_GRN_NO , FOLDER_NM , DCMB_CRE_ID , SORT_SNO , FRT_USR_ID , FNL_USR_ID , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD , FNL_MNU_ID , TO_CHAR(FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRT_REGI_DH , TO_CHAR(FNL_MDF_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FNL_MDF_DH FROM TBBADDED108M WHERE AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND AUD_NO = #{audNo}

SELECT 'TBBADDED108D' AS TBL_NM , (SELECT COMMENTS FROM ALL_TAB_COMMENTS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'TBBADDED108D' AND OWNER = 'UBCREOWN') AS TBL_DESC , #{cmtYr} AS CMT_YR , #{cmtDvsnCd} AS CMT_DVSN_CD , #{cmtSq} AS CMT_SQ , #{cmtSbjSno} AS CMT_SBJ_SNO , AUD_YR , AUD_NO , EVI_DCMB_SNO , AUD_DCM_DOC_ID , AUD_KND_CD , AUD_GRN_NO , EVI_DCM_DVSN_CD , FILE_NM , ISUE_DY , EVI_DCMB_DVSN_CD , AFF_SNO , AUD_DCM_CRE_ID , SORT_SNO , FILE_SIZE , FRT_USR_ID , FNL_USR_ID , FNL_DEAL_DPT_CD , FNL_MNU_ID , TO_CHAR(FRT_REGI_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FRT_REGI_DH , TO_CHAR(FNL_MDF_DH, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS FNL_MDF_DH , RLTN_ORG_NM , RLTN_REL_PER , EVI_DCM_NO , CHG_HIS_RMK , DOC_STA_CD , EVI_DCM_GRP_SNO FROM TBBADDED108D WHERE AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND AUD_NO = #{audNo}

SELECT AUD_DCM_DOC_ID AS DOC_ID FROM TBBADDED108D WHERE AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND AUD_NO = #{audNo} UNION ALL SELECT D.DOC_ID FROM (SELECT A.AUD_YR ,A.AUD_NO ,A.SBCN_DY ,C.SRNO FROM TBBADDED113M A INNER JOIN TBBADDED146M B ON A.AUD_YR = B.AUD_YR AND A.AUD_NO = B.AUD_NO AND A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID AND A.AFF_SNO = B.AFF_SNO AND A.DSP_RQ_SNO = B.DSP_RQ_SNO AND A.APVR_CD =B.APVR_CD INNER JOIN TBCSPKDE106M C ON C.AUD_YR = A.AUD_YR AND C.AUD_NO = A.AUD_NO AND C.AFF_SNO = A.AFF_SNO AND C.RPRT_FILD_ID = B.RPRT_FILD_ID GROUP BY A.AUD_YR, A.AUD_NO,A.SBCN_DY , C.SRNO ) A INNER JOIN TBCSPKDE104M D ON A.AUD_YR = D.AUD_YR AND A.AUD_NO = D.AUD_NO AND A.SRNO = D.SRNO WHERE 1=1 AND A.AUD_YR = #{audYr} /*PARAMETER 필수 PK 사용*/ AND A.AUD_NO = #{audNo} /*PARAMETER 감사번호 - 안건단위로 조회 시 필요*/ AND A.SBCN_DY = #{cmtDy} /*PARAMETER 위원회의 일자 */ UNION ALL SELECT C.DOC_ID FROM (SELECT A.AUD_YR, A.AUD_NO, B.RPRT_FILD_ID FROM TBBADDED113M A INNER JOIN TBBADDED146M B ON A.AUD_YR = B.AUD_YR AND A.AUD_NO = B.AUD_NO AND A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID AND A.AFF_SNO = B.AFF_SNO AND A.DSP_RQ_SNO = B.DSP_RQ_SNO AND A.APVR_CD = B.APVR_CD WHERE A.SBCN_DY = #{cmtDy} GROUP BY A.AUD_YR, A.AUD_NO, B.RPRT_FILD_ID ) A INNER JOIN TBBADDED115M C ON C.AUD_YR = A.AUD_YR AND C.AUD_NO = A.AUD_NO AND C.RPRT_FILD_ID = A.RPRT_FILD_ID WHERE A.AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND A.AUD_NO = #{audNo} UNION ALL SELECT C.DOC_ID FROM (SELECT A.AUD_YR, A.AUD_NO, B.RPRT_FILD_ID FROM TBBADDED113M A INNER JOIN TBBADDED146M B ON A.AUD_YR = B.AUD_YR AND A.AUD_NO = B.AUD_NO AND A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID AND A.AFF_SNO = B.AFF_SNO AND A.DSP_RQ_SNO = B.DSP_RQ_SNO AND A.APVR_CD = B.APVR_CD WHERE A.SBCN_DY = #{cmtDy} GROUP BY A.AUD_YR, A.AUD_NO, B.RPRT_FILD_ID ) A INNER JOIN TBBADDED110M C ON C.AUD_YR = A.AUD_YR AND C.AUD_NO = A.AUD_NO AND C.RPRT_FILD_ID = A.RPRT_FILD_ID WHERE A.AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND A.AUD_NO = #{audNo} UNION ALL SELECT DOC_ID FROM TBBADDED103M WHERE AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND AUD_NO = #{audNo} AND ((RPRT_CD IN ('A10700500', 'A10700600', 'A10700800' ,'A10700700') AND REF_DY = (SELECT SBCN_REGI_REQ_DT FROM TBBADDED113M WHERE SBCN_DY = #{cmtDy} )) OR (RPRT_CD = 'A10600900' AND REF_ID IN (SELECT C.RPRT_LINK_SEQ FROM TBBADDED113M A INNER JOIN TBBADDED146M B ON A.AUD_YR = B.AUD_YR AND A.AUD_NO = B.AUD_NO AND A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID AND A.AFF_SNO = B.AFF_SNO AND A.DSP_RQ_SNO = B.DSP_RQ_SNO AND A.APVR_CD = B.APVR_CD INNER JOIN TBCSPKDE106M C ON C.AUD_YR = A.AUD_YR AND C.AUD_NO = A.AUD_NO AND C.AFF_SNO = A.AFF_SNO AND C.RPRT_FILD_ID = B.RPRT_FILD_ID WHERE A.SBCN_DY = #{cmtDy} GROUP BY A.AUD_YR, A.AUD_NO, C.RPRT_LINK_SEQ ,A.SBCN_DY)) OR (RPRT_CD = 'A10601000' AND REF_ID = (SELECT AFF_SNO FROM TBBADDED113M WHERE AUD_YR = #{audYr} AND AUD_NO = #{audNo} AND SBCN_DY = #{cmtDy}
)))
